text: Benjamin Joseph Levin (born March 8, 1988), known professionally as Benny Blanco, is an American record producer, songwriter, record executive and author. He was honored into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2013. He has also won five BMI Songwriter of the Year Awards, won the 2017 iHeartRadio Producer of the Year Award, and received 11 Grammy Award nominations. Blanco has been in a relationship with singer and actress Selena Gomez since June 2023.
